Steps.StepString: Analyzed the website behavior and noticed that an idea can be posted with an assigned ID that can be voted on.

Substeps.SubstepString: Analyzed the website behavior.
Noticed that an idea can be posted with an assigned ID.
Understood the idea can be voted on.

Steps.StepString: Examined HTML source code to understand the layout and elements of the webpage and its voting system.

Substeps.SubstepString: Examined the HTML source code.
Understood the layout and elements of the webpage.
Understood the voting system of the webpage.

Steps.StepString: Reviewed JavaScript 'index.js' to understand the methods used for voting.

Substeps.SubstepString: Reviewed JavaScript 'index.js'.
Understood the methods used for voting.

Steps.StepString: Identification of a voting procedure challenge that requires solving. A string has to be found so that the MD5 hash of this string exactly matches the challenge.

Substeps.SubstepString: Identified a voting procedure challenge.
Understood that a string needs to be found to match the MD5 hash of the challenge.

Steps.StepString: Noticed that each challenge string must be found every time it is called, which can be optimized.

Substeps.SubstepString: Noticed that each challenge string must be found every time it is called.
Recognized the potential for optimization.

Steps.StepString: Wrote a script to use a cache which stores all attempts for generating the challenge strings.

Substeps.SubstepString: Wrote a script to use a cache.
Ensured the cache stores all attempts for generating the challenge strings.

Steps.StepString: Implemented a smart voter script that utilizes a previously saved cache. This minimizes the time spent on creating strings that match the challenge given by the server.

Substeps.SubstepString: Implemented a smart voter script.
Ensured the script utilizes a previously saved cache.
Minimized time spent on creating strings to match the server's challenge.

Steps.StepString: Script causes browser to begin voting process. Process continues until more than 250 votes are cast during the same PHP session.

Substeps.SubstepString: Script was launched causing the browser to start the voting process.
Ensured the voting process continues until more than 250 votes are cast in the same PHP session.

Steps.StepString: Observed that obtaining the flag message requires waiting for a response from the server after each vote.

Substeps.SubstepString: Observed the need for a server response after each vote.
Understood obtaining the flag message requires waiting for such server response.

Steps.StepString: After reaching 250 votes, flag message is returned by the server.

Substeps.SubstepString: Reached the total of 250 votes.
Received the flag message returned by the server.
